game.name: Rider 2
game.description:
Bike riding is a hobby of many a young boy. This time we do not have to ride a bike on a road, but a kind of unique track that also includes some gaps! Are you ready to accept this unique challenge? Join Rider 2 game and get ready to perform some death-defying and insane stunts while cruising through the highly-challenging platform! Click the play button and take your seat on your bike and begin flipping to become the biggest biker of your city!
Try to make as many deadly jumps as you can to challenge your expert rivals with your best scores in this brand new bike game! Grab the maximum number of coins you see on your way and use them to purchase our own favorite motorcycles! There are 10 unique and extremely challenging levels to explore in this fast-paced neon racing action challenge. You have to face off different course in each level. Make sure that your bike lands with its wheels facing down every time. 
Timely acceleration is required to guide you towards the victory in each level! Collect more coins to unlock more awesome neon bikes! Race through the multiple challenging neon themed levels while avoiding the deadly obstacles in this html5 racing game! The graphics and music of this sequel of the original Rider game are very cool and the gameplay is a pretty addictive. Let us see how long you will be able to drive without crashing or dying! Good luck to become a master of bike flipping!
